body.name: Tide Deep Cleansing Fabric Rinse with 3X Odor Power, Original Scent, 48 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 17 mins
features: NEW DEEP CLEANSING FABRIC RINSE: Replaces traditional liquid fabric softener and acts as a laundry detergent booster to help remove stubborn odors and residues deep within fabrics
3X ODOR POWER: The breakthrough laundry odor remover rinses away residues and odors better than detergent alone
EASY TO USE: Add detergent first, then pour Tide Fabric Rinse in your liquid fabric softener dispenser or directly in the rinse cycle
SAFE ON ALL FABRICS: Works with your laundry detergent to remove odors from activewear, baby clothes, towels and more
SOFTER, BRIGHTER FABRICS: Tide Deep Cleansing Fabric Rinse breaks down and rinses away resides, leaving behind softer and fresher fabrics vs detergent alone
ORIGINAL FRESH: Use with Downy scent booster beads for more freshness.
GENTLE ON SENSTIVE SKIN: Free of dyes and heavy perfumes, making it gentle on sensitive skin
body.description: Tired of stubborn odors that never seem to wash out of your clothes? Introducing Tide Deep Cleansing Fabric Rinse, a breakthrough laundry odor remover with 3X Odor Power designed to break down & rinse away smelly residues trapped within fabric fibers, leaving behind light Tide Original scent freshness. NEW Tide Deep Cleansing Fabric Rinse acts as a laundry detergent booster to help remove residues and odors from activewear and all machine washable fabrics. This leaves fabrics fresher, softer, and brighter than before. No more reappearing odors. Smelly activewear, musty towels, even forgotten laundry in your washing machine overnight… Tide Deep Cleansing Fabric Rinse strips odors away without the use of vinegar or other homemade laundry hacks. And because it’s free of dyes and heavy perfumes, this odor remover is gentle on sensitive skin and perfect for baby clothes, too. Plus, it’s easy to use! Start by dosing detergent first, then add Tide Deep Cleansing Fabric Rinse to your liquid fabric softener dispenser or directly into the rinse cycle. Want to add additional fresh scent? Add Downy scent booster beads or Gain scent booster beads to your routine for extra freshness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My only complaint about Tide Rinse…
reviews.reviewText: Is the dang bottle! There is no way to measure a dose. If you use the cap it’s shallow and you have to fill it twice - impossible without spilling product. Bottle gets slippery (after spilling product) and I’ve dropped BOTH bottles (resulting in cracked plastic and more spillage. Otherwise, THIS STUFF ROCKS NO KIDDING!Amazed at how well it works. Clothes are DEFINITELY cleaner and smell amazing. I have noticed not to use it on items two washes in-a-row. It makes the fabric unhappy. I can’t think of another way to describe it. Use it every OTHER washing. Do use it though…there is absolutely no denying this product’s effectiveness! It’s not a fabric softener…it’s a low ph rinse aid and it’s a game changer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It smells sooo good
reviews.reviewText: This rinse smells better and is stronger than scent beads. I don't know if it does what it claims, but laundry comes out smelling really nice and fresh. A little goes a long way. You don't need to use much at all.The only downside aside from the ridiculous price is that the bottle lacks a pour spout. It should really have one. I just pour it directly into drum during the rinse cycle, but I could imagine trying to pour it into a fabric softener dispenser or Downy ball would be annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Made my teen boys clothes smell fresh for a really long time! Noticeably fresh! Love this stuff-

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is AmaZing! We have furbabies and this takes those smells out! And those bathroom towels,bath mats &smell wonderful.Plus makes EVERYTHING so SOFT! My bedding hasn't been softer since using this. So, this is now one of my MUST have laundry items.Highly recommend & YES, for those w/ sensitive skin, Downy has it in Free & Clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for some odors, not so much with others
reviews.reviewText: I have three different types of odors to contend with when I do laundry. The first is heavy tobacco smoke, acquired secondhand during several hours in small, poorly ventilated spaces with multiple heavy cigarette smokers. This product is fantastic for that- even when the cigarette smell is eye wateringly strong. Until I find a way to get my emo younger relations to stop smoking (maybe when they outgrow the emo thing?), I will continue to buy this product in bulk.The second odor is various laboratory chemicals like formalin, xylene, and glutaraldehyde. This fabric rinse struggles there, but manages to get rid of lower levels of all three. It doesn't do much against more than a small amount of xylene, but then again, very few things besides a blowtorch can completely banish xylene.The third odor is from bodily fluids. There are dozens of products on the market formulated specifically for urine, feces, or both. If that is what you are trying to get rid of in your laundry, I would recommend exploring those more specific products instead. This rinse will work reasonably well against a small spot or two, but if you are washing clothing and sheets for someone with incontinence issues, this just isn't up to the job.Two other positive points about this product: It has a scent, but it is minimal. It doesn't cover odors in fabrics with a layer of fake lavender or whatever, but actually removes them. Also, it is a pretty decent fabric softener, and I have found that I don't have to add one when I use this rinse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Say GOODBYE to a funky smelling Washer
reviews.reviewText: I’ve always preferred top load washing machines After moving into a rental with a well used washing machine I found my clothes smelling funky immediately after the wash cycle was complete. I tried everything from a cleaning cycle with bleach and leaving the door open when it wasn’t in use. Nothing seemed to work. After using Tide Clean Boost my laundry is smelly amazing and the washing machine no longer has a funky mildew smell! I’ll definitely subscribe to have this shipped with my other favorite products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This smells amazing
reviews.reviewText: I always like to try new products when they come out so I ordered this just to try. It smells amazing on the clothes and very easy to use. Great find.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you love the clean laundry smell..
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE the smell of clean laundry. I just can't get enough of this product! It doesn't leave a heavy coat on your laundry like fabric softener can but you do get such a great clean clean smell with your laundry. It helped get that ick smell out of clothes that were forgotten in the washer.
